original_title: Je suis la Fête des Vignerons
overview: It is like a miracle that has occurred five times a century since 1797. The Fête des Vignerons frees the character of the Vaudois from their legendary restraint. It turns an entire region into a gigantic drunken boat. The 2019 arena welcomes 20,000 spectators, the equivalent of the population of Vevey. Guarantor of tradition, the Confrérie des Vignerons ensures that it evolves and engages the artists who best stick to their time.
title: Je suis la Fête des Vignerons
